reuo.resources.io

Class MemoryIndexedLoader<E extends Entry,R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuo.resources.io.Loader<R>
      • reuo.resources.io.IndexedLoader<E,R>
        • reuo.resources.io.MemoryIndexedLoader<E,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the type of entries in the index
    R - the type of resources being loaded
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Integer>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FontLoader, SpeechLoader

    public abstract class MemoryIndexedLoader<E extends Entry,R>
extends IndexedLoader<E,R>
    A Loader that has an index that was generated and is stored in memory. The index should be small, otherwise a StoredIndexedLoader should be used.
    Author:
    Kristopher Ives, Lucas Green

      • iterator

        public Iterator<Integer> iterator()
        Description copied from class: IndexedLoader
        Gets an iteration of the valid entry identifiers in the index. Implementing classes may override this, but by default this will iterate from 0 to Loader.getCapacity() only returning valid entries.
        Specified by:
        iterator in interface Iterable<Integer>
        Overrides:
        iterator in class IndexedLoader<E extends Entry,R>
